name: Cross Roads High
description:
Cross Roads High

Cross Roads High is an action packed isometric game about time-travel, past lives and a massive wildfire.

In this game, the player will shoot through 3 levels containing 6 different enemies and bosses!

This game was made as an exercise in level design.

The Team:

Joshua Kennedy - Environment Design, Narrative Design

James Steendyk - Programmer, Level Layout

Josh Tulleners - Team Leader, Level Designer, Shader Designer

Joshua van Wyk - 3D Artist, Environmental Design
